title: The 20YA | A Tribute To "Rozz"
body_text: A special live tribute, long overdue — Mike's contributions and ECD story will be celebrated with his mother, Christine, present to experience what her son helped create and build for all of us to enjoy. It's another reason to attend and trust the attendance may truly break every possible record. See you on 9/27!
